attributes.action: No Homework over school holidays and half term.
attributes.additional_details: This will improve the students social life and give them the opportunity to focus on something else other than school so they are more productive when they return to school.
attributes.background: Teachers should only advise revision if necessary (for a unit test or exam after the holiday) and not set homework that can be punished by detention if not completed. this will give students the option if they want to do homework and gives them the option to focus on clubs and hobbies out of school.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about matters which are not the responsibility of Government or Parliament. Decisions about when to set homework would be the responsibility of your school. 

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229157
